shortdesc.ph: Sets the encoder configuration for the local video.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setVideoEncoderConfigurationEx( VideoEncoderConfiguration config, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int setVideoEncoderConfigurationEx(const VideoEncoderConfiguration& config, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int SetVideoEncoderConfigurationEx(VideoEncoderConfiguration config, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: Each configuration profile corresponds to a set of video parameters, including the resolution, frame rate, and bitrate.

The config specified in this method is the maximum values under ideal network conditions. If the network condition is not good, the video engine cannot use the config renders local video, which automatically reduces to an appropriate video parameter setting.
